meanings.definition: The rear surface of the human body from the shoulders to the hips.
meanings.sent1: She leaned against the wall with her hands on her backs.
meanings.sent2: The backpack was heavy on his backs as he hiked up the hill.
meanings.sent3: The chair's backs seemed to be whispering secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight cast shadows on the backs of the trees, creating a mystical scene.
meanings.sent5: The sunburn on his backs reminded him of the long day at the beach.

meanings.definition: The side or part of something that is opposite the front.
meanings.sent1: The bookshelf had a mirror on its backs to reflect the room.
meanings.sent2: The car's engine is located under the hood at the backs.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with colorful frosting on its backs.
meanings.sent4: The detective found a hidden compartment at the backs of the drawer.
meanings.sent5: The map showed the treasure buried deep in the backs of the island.

meanings.definition: To support or assist someone or something.
meanings.sent1: She always backs her friends in times of need.
meanings.sent2: The team backed each other up during the intense match.
meanings.sent3: The teacher backed the student's idea with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: The community backed the charity event with generous donations.
meanings.sent5: His family always backs him in pursuing his dreams.

meanings.definition: To move in a backward direction.
meanings.sent1: He backs away slowly from the growling dog.
meanings.sent2: The car backs up to make space for the delivery truck.
meanings.sent3: The cat backs into the corner when scared.
meanings.sent4: The hiker backs off the steep cliff cautiously.
meanings.sent5: The dancer gracefully backs across the stage during the performance.

meanings.definition: To bet on the outcome of an event.
meanings.sent1: He backs his favorite team to win the championship.
meanings.sent2: She backs the horse with the best odds to place first.
meanings.sent3: The friends back their predictions with a friendly wager.
meanings.sent4: The gambler backs the roulette number with confidence.
meanings.sent5: The crowd eagerly backs their chosen contestant in the competition.
